## maven导入依赖

### 1.在 pom.xml 中编写 <dependencies> 标签

![image-20230625141728227](https://trok-typora-img.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/img/202306251417330.png)

### 2.在 <dependencies> 标签中使用 <dependency> 引入坐标定义坐标的 groupId，artifactId，version

![image-20230625141804897](https://trok-typora-img.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/img/202306251418957.png)

### 3.点击刷新按钮，使坐标生效

![image-20230625141835394](https://trok-typora-img.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/img/202306251418485.png)
